quotes.quote: The most dangerous enemy is not the one who lingers behind you in the shadows, but the one who walks beside you as a friend.
The world is a dangerous place to live; not because of the people who are evil, but because of the people who don't do anything about it.
The most dangerous ideas in a society are not the ones being argued, but the ones that are assumed.
Most dangerous is that temptation that doth good us on to sin to loving virtue.
It is dangerous to understand new things too quickly.
A nation without humor is not only sad but dangerous.
There is nothing so difficult or so dangerous as to undertake to change the order of things.
It is dangerous to be sincere unless you are also stupid.
There's nothing more dangerous than someone who wants to make the world a better place.
It's dangerous to get too far from what they identify you with.
The most dangerous silence is the one where the impending danger is more silent than the silence there
To be right is dangerous, it has ever been the source of all intolerance.
Theories then are dangerous things.
The most dangerous creation of any society is the man who has nothing to lose.
Success is dangerous. One begins to copy oneself, and to copy oneself is more dangerous than to copy others. It leads to sterility.
There is nobody more dangerous than one who has been humiliated, even when you humiliate him rightly.
The world is too dangerous for anything but truth and too small for anything but love.
A gun is no more dangerous than a cricket bat in the hands of a madman.
The most dangerous negativity comes from ourselves in the form of doubts, fears and unreasonable self-criticisms.
The most dangerous enemy is that which no one fears.
The most dangerous enemy is the one who can easily make friends with his potential victims!
The most dangerous thing in the world is to have no purpose.
Next to power without honor, the most dangerous thing in the world is power without humor.
The dangerous thing about hate is that it seems so reasonable.
It is a dangerous thing to have instant access to your emotions.
You can't take away knowledge, and it's dangerous to pretend you never had it.
It is dangerous to know, but it is more dangerous not to know.
The most dangerous enemy in the world is the one you do not recognize.
You fear tomorrow: yet yesterday is just as dangerous.
It is dangerous to be right in matters on which the established authorities are wrong.
It's dangerous when people are willing to give up their privacy.
It is a dangerous thing to reform anyone.
It is dangerous, at any time, to multiply sources of weakness.
Nothing is as dangerous as a sure thing.
The greater the power, the more dangerous the abuse.
The most dangerous flaws are those which are good in moderation.
The most dangerous thing about power is to employ it where it is not applicable.
It is a very dangerous thing to have an idea that you will not practice.
The most dangerous liars are those who think they are telling the truth.
It is dangerous to exist in the world. To exist is to be threatened. We must live with threats.
Dangerous objects are glamorous places to be.
Nothing's dangerous if you know what you're doing.
So dangerous it is for a man to come into the acquisition of great fortune before he matures in virtues and principles.
Beware of false knowledge; it is more dangerous than ignorance.
The most dangerous moment comes with victory.
There's nothing so dangerous for anyone who has something to hide as conversation.
Power is dangerous unless you have humility.
Most dangerous is that temptation that doth goad us on to sin in loving virtue.
It is more dangerous that even a guilty person should be punished without the forms of law than that he should escape.
